perturbation.original_text: For the License Term and within the Licensed Territory, Producer hereby grants to ConvergTV a right and license to Distribute the program, file or video listed on the Deal Terms above (the "Program") consisting of (check one) ¨ episodes (series) or x one-offs, for unlimited runs for the License Term through ConvergTV channels and/or other distribution outlets, in accordance with the License Rights. The terms "License Term", "Licensed Rights", and "Licensed Territory" shall have the meaning specified in the Deal Terms above, which such Deal Terms are part of this Agreement and are hereby incorporated herein by reference. As used in this Agreement and this license, the term "Distribute" includes, but is not limited to, any and all License Rights specified in the Deal Terms, all rights of distribution, the right to copy and reproduce the Program, the right to create derivative works of the Program for the purpose of creating branding elements and short form promotional materials ("Promotional Works"), the right to sell copies, the right to import and export the Program and the Promotional Works, the right to display the Program and Promotional Works publicity, the right to transmit the Program and Promotional Works through any transmission or delivery method that exists today, or that is created in the future, to any number of devices or users, including transmission through simultaneous delivery or streaming, and the right to sublicense and/or assign some or all of these rights to others.
perturbation.changed_text: For the License Term and within the Licensed Territory, Producer hereby grants to ConvergTV a right and license to Distribute the program, file or video listed on the Deal Terms above (the "Program") consisting of (check one) ¨ episodes (series) or x one-offs, for a period determined at ConvergTV's discretion for the License Term through ConvergTV channels and/or other distribution outlets, in accordance with the License Rights. The terms "License Term", "Licensed Rights", and "Licensed Territory" shall have the meaning specified in the Deal Terms above, which such Deal Terms are part of this Agreement and are hereby incorporated herein by reference. As used in this Agreement and this license, the term "Distribute" includes, but is not limited to, any and all License Rights specified in the Deal Terms, all rights of distribution, the right to copy and reproduce the Program, the right to create derivative works of the Program for the purpose of creating branding elements and short form promotional materials ("Promotional Works"), the right to sell copies, the right to import and export the Program and the Promotional Works, the right to display the Program and Promotional Works publicity, the right to transmit the Program and Promotional Works through any transmission or delivery method that exists today, or that is created in the future, to any number of devices or users, including transmission through simultaneous delivery or streaming, and the right to sublicense and/or assign some or all of these rights to others.
perturbation.explanation: The original text grants a license for "unlimited runs". The modified text changes this to a period determined at ConvergTV's discretion. This contradicts the original "unlimited runs" clause, creating uncertainty about the actual duration of the license.

perturbation.original_text: During the License Term (which is identified in the Deal Terms), Producer agrees that ConvergTV has the exclusive right to exercise the rights granted to it under this Agreement with respect to the Program, including those in Section 1, within the Licensed Territory.
perturbation.changed_text: During a period as determined at Producer's descretion, Producer agrees that ConvergTV has the exclusive right to exercise the rights granted to it under this Agreement with respect to the Program, including those in Section 1, within the Licensed Territory.
perturbation.explanation: The original text ensures exclusivity for ConvergTV during the License Term. The modified text adds 'During a period as determined at Producer's discretion' which allows the Producer to dictate the exclusivity period. This placement undermines ConvergTV's assumed exclusive rights, thus creating contradiction.

perturbation.original_text: Producer shall indemnify, defend and hold harmless ConvergTV and its parents, subsidiaries, divisions, officers, directors, employees, attorneys and agents, and their respective successors or assigns, from all costs, expenses and damages arising from any costs, errors, omissions, slander, losses, liability or for any other cause as a direct or indirect result of the Distribution, transmission or publication of the Producer's Program or content.
perturbation.changed_text: Producer shall indemnify, defend and hold harmless ConvergTV and its parents, subsidiaries, divisions, officers, directors, employees, attorneys and agents, and their respective successors or assigns, only for the costs, expenses and damages directly arising from the Producer's gross negligence or willful misconduct related to the Distribution, transmission or publication of the Producer's Program or content.
perturbation.explanation: The original text says the Producer will indemnify ConvergTV for all cost, expenses, and damages as a direct or indirect result. The change modifies this to where the Producer only indemnifies in cases of gross negligence or willful misconduct. The original covers more use cases. It could be debated what happens if it's a mistake rather than gross negligence or willful misconduct. The edited text creates uncertainity.
